title: T206 SGC 50 Bresnahan with bat SOLD
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: T206 SGC 50 Bresnahan with bat SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi. Just got this one and it's not doin' it for me. It's a Piedmont 350 back. I would like to trade it for any of the following t206 portraits (SGC 40 no creases to 50):
Beckley
Chesbro
Huggins
Jennings
Keeler
McGraw (no cap)
Waddell
Wallace
Willis
I'll add the following also:
Joss (pitching)
Clarke (with bat)
Wheat
Flick
Baker
Keeler (batting)
Crawford (batting)
Marquard (hands at thighs)
Jennings (1 & 2 hands)
Waddell (follow through)
McGinnity
Would also consider Southern Leaguers from my previous post a few days ago or a Mike Powers SGC 60 or a 50 +cash.
Let's see what you've got! Send scans to [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
